get.summary: Listado de todos los pilotos que existen en la F1.
get.description:
Servicio que devuelve la información detallada de todos los pilotos que existen en la F1.

 

¿Cuáles son los pilotos existentes en la F1?

application/json.Name: Sergio Pérez
application/json.DriverInfo:
Sergio Pérez is a Mexican Formula 1 driver born on January 26th, 1990. The first race Sergio Pérez drove was the 2011 Australian Grand Prix. Since then Pérez has driven 258 races in total.
In these 258 races, Pérez won 6 races, finshed on the podium 35 times and scored a total of 1474 points. The 2023 Las Vegas Grand Prix was the last race Pérez has entered.
Currently Sergio is driving for Red Bull.

get.summary: Informacion a un piloto en especifico de la F1.
get.description:
Servicio que devuelve la información detallada del piloto solicitado

 

¿Cuál es del piloto asociado a este id?

application/json.Name: Sergio Pérez
application/json.DriverInfo:
Sergio Pérez is a Mexican Formula 1 driver born on January 26th, 1990. The first race Sergio Pérez drove was the 2011 Australian Grand Prix. Since then Pérez has driven 258 races in total.
In these 258 races, Pérez won 6 races, finshed on the podium 35 times and scored a total of 1474 points. The 2023 Las Vegas Grand Prix was the last race Pérez has entered.
Currently Sergio is driving for Red Bull.

delete.summary: Eliminar un piloto de la F1.
delete.description:
Servicio que elimina un piloto dado su Identificador

 

¿Fué una ejecución exitosa?

get.summary: Listado de todos las escuderias que existen en la F1.
get.description:
Servicio que devuelve la información detallada de todas las escuderias que existen en la F1.

 

¿Cuáles son las escuderías existentes en la F1?

application/json.Name: Red Bull
application/json.TeamInfo: Red Bull were no strangers to F1 - as sponsors - prior to formally entering as a works team in 2004. Nonetheless, the scale of their success over the following decade was staggering. After a first podium in 2006, the team hit their stride in 2009, claiming six victories and second in the constructors' standings. Over the next four seasons they were a tour de force, claiming consecutive title doubles between 2010 and 2013, with Sebastian Vettel emerging as the sport's youngest quadruple champion. Now they are recapturing that glory with an equally exciting talent – one named Max Verstappen…

get.summary: Informacion a una escudería en especifico de la F1.
get.description:
Servicio que devuelve la información detallada de la escudería solicitado

 

¿Cuál es la escuderia asociada a este id?

application/json.Name: Red Bull
application/json.TeamInfo: Red Bull were no strangers to F1 - as sponsors - prior to formally entering as a works team in 2004. Nonetheless, the scale of their success over the following decade was staggering. After a first podium in 2006, the team hit their stride in 2009, claiming six victories and second in the constructors' standings. Over the next four seasons they were a tour de force, claiming consecutive title doubles between 2010 and 2013, with Sebastian Vettel emerging as the sport's youngest quadruple champion. Now they are recapturing that glory with an equally exciting talent – one named Max Verstappen…

get.summary: Listado de todos los circuitos la F1.
get.description:
Servicio que devuelve la información detallada de todos los circuitos de la F1.

 

¿Cuáles son los circuitos existentes en la F1?

application/json.Name: A1-Ring
application/json.Information: A1-Ring is a circuit in Spielburg, Austria. The first race ever held was the 1970 Austrian Grand Prix on August 16th, 1970 and was won by Jacky Ickx. In total 25 races were held at A1-Ring and the last race was the 2003 Austrian Grand Prix.
